sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Ben Wolfe
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE `room_temperature` ( `room_temperature_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `time` datetime NOT NULL, `temp` int(11) NOT NULL, `uuid` varchar(38) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`room_temperature_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
